title: Firewall Error for 3 days now :(
body: I receive this ''unable to connect to the server. If you have a firewall, it may be blocking the connection. Please refer to your firewall's documentation'' after the patch, never had this problem before. would anyone know how to fix this? I tried heaps of different methods and nothing seems to work, so third day without League zzZ

replies.body:
Hey Pycckuu007,

Please head over to http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/WlGElu7g-update-firewall-error-after-champion-select and rad through the information there, we are currently gathering reports from players so we can determine what is causing this issue.

All updates will be posted in that thread.
